revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The lucky idiot: or, fools have fortune. Verified in the life of D. Pedro de Cenudo, whose follies had generally a prosperous event: ... Written in Spanish, by Don..."
revision.text: Possibly: The lucky idiot: or, fools have fortune. Verified in the life of D. Pedro de Cenudo, whose follies had generally a prosperous event: ... Written in Spanish, by Don Quevedo de Alcala. Now rendred [sic] into modern English by a person of quality. (London : printed for H. Hitch and L. Hawes; S. Crowder and Co., 1760). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2304425~S5
